verses.verse: וַ֭יַּעַן <WH6030> answered אֱלִיפַ֥ז <WH464> Then Eliphaz הַֽתֵּמָנִ֗י <WH8489> the Temanite וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> and said

הַלְאֵ֥ל <WH410> unto God יִסְכָּן־ <WH5532> be profitable גָּ֑בֶר <WH1397> Can a man כִּֽי־ <WH3588> as יִסְכֹּ֖ן <WH5532> may be profitable עָלֵ֣ימוֹ <WH5921> and מַשְׂכִּֽיל׃ <WH7919> he that is wise

הַחֵ֣פֶץ <WH2656> [Is it] any pleasure לְ֭שַׁדַּי <WH7706> to the Almighty כִּ֣י <WH3588> if תִצְדָּ֑ק <WH6663> that thou art righteous וְאִם־ <WH518> Or בֶּ֝֗צַע <WH1215> ? or [is it] gain כִּֽי־ <WH3588> if תַתֵּ֥ם <WH8552> perfect דְּרָכֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1870> [to him] that thou makest thy ways
הֲֽ֭מִיִּרְאָ֣תְךָ <WH3374> thee for fear יֹכִיחֶ֑ךָ <WH3198> Will he reprove יָב֥וֹא <WH935> of thee? will he enter עִ֝מְּךָ֗ <WH5973> against בַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> judgment
הֲלֹ֣א <WH3808> not רָעָֽתְךָ֣ <WH7451> [Is] not thy wickedness רַבָּ֑ה <WH7227> great וְאֵֽין־ <WH369> without קֵ֝֗ץ <WH7093> after לַעֲוֹנֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5771> and your iniquities

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for תַחְבֹּ֣ל <WH2254> For thou hast taken a pledge אַחֶ֣יךָ <WH251> from thy brother חִנָּ֑ם <WH2600> for nought וּבִגְדֵ֖י <WH899> of their clothing עֲרוּמִּ֣ים <WH6174> the naked תַּפְשִֽׁיט׃ <WH6584> and stripped

לֹא־ <WH3808> no מַ֭יִם <WH4325> Thou hast not given water עָיֵ֣ף <WH5889> to the weary תַּשְׁקֶ֑ה <WH8248> to drink וּ֝מֵרָעֵ֗ב <WH7456> famish תִּֽמְנַֽע־ <WH4513> and thou hast withholden לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> bread
וְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man זְ֭רוֹעַ <WH2220> But [as for] the mighty ל֣וֹ הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> he had the earth וּנְשׂ֥וּא <WH5375> accept פָ֝נִ֗ים <WH6440> accept יֵ֣שֶׁב <WH3427> dwelt בָּֽהּ׃
אַ֭לְמָנוֹת <WH490> widows שִׁלַּ֣חְתָּ <WH7971> Thou hast sent רֵיקָ֑ם <WH7387> away empty וּזְרֹע֖וֹת <WH2220> and the arms יְתֹמִ֣ים <WH3490> of the fatherless יְדֻכָּֽא׃ <WH1792> have been broken

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֭ן <WH3651> after that סְבִיבוֹתֶ֣יךָ <WH5439> [are] round about פַחִ֑ים <WH6341> Therefore snares וִֽ֝יבַהֶלְךָ <WH926> troubleth פַּ֣חַד <WH6343> fear פִּתְאֹֽם׃ <WH6597> thee and sudden

אוֹ־ <WH176> Or חֹ֥שֶׁךְ <WH2822> Or darkness לֹֽא־ <WH3808> you cannot תִרְאֶ֑ה <WH7200> [that] thou canst not see וְֽשִׁפְעַת־ <WH8229> and abundance מַ֥יִם <WH4325> of waters תְּכַסֶּֽךָּ׃ <WH3680> cover

הֲ‍ֽלֹא־ <WH3808> is not אֱ֭לוֹהַּ <WH433> [Is] not God גֹּ֣בַהּ <WH1363> in the height שָׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> air וּרְאֵ֤ה <WH7200> advise self רֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> the height כּוֹכָבִ֣ים <WH3556> of the stars כִּי־ <WH3588> how רָֽמּוּ׃ <WH7311> how high
וְֽ֭אָמַרְתָּ <WH559> And thou sayest מַה־ <WH4100> What יָּ֣דַֽע <WH3045> know אֵ֑ל <WH410> How doth God הַבְעַ֖ד <WH1157> through עֲרָפֶ֣ל <WH6205> the thick יִשְׁפּֽוֹט׃ <WH8199> ? can he judge

עָבִ֣ים <WH5645> Thick clouds סֵֽתֶר־ <WH5643> [are] a covering ל֭וֹ וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot יִרְאֶ֑ה <WH7200> to him that he seeth וְח֥וּג <WH2329> in the circuit שָׁ֝מַ֗יִם <WH8064> of heaven יִתְהַלָּֽךְ׃ <WH1980> not and he walketh
הַאֹ֣רַח <WH734> way עוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> the old תִּשְׁמֹ֑ר <WH8104> Hast thou marked אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> Which דָּרְכ֣וּ <WH1869> have trodden מְתֵי־ <WH4962> men אָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> which wicked

אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> Who קֻמְּט֥וּ <WH7059> Which were cut down וְלֹא־ <WH3808> before עֵ֑ת <WH6256> out of time נָ֝הָ֗ר <WH5104> with a flood יוּצַ֥ק <WH3332> was overflown יְסוֹדָֽם׃ <WH3247> whose foundation

הָאֹמְרִ֣ים <WH559> Which said לָ֭אֵל <WH410> unto God ס֣וּר <WH5493> Depart מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <WH4480> us' וּמַה־ <WH4100> and What יִּפְעַ֖ל <WH6466> do שַׁדַּ֣י <WH7706> from us and what can the Almighty לָֽמוֹ׃

וְה֤וּא <WH1931> He מִלֵּ֣א <WH4390> Yet he filled בָתֵּיהֶ֣ם <WH1004> their houses ט֑וֹב <WH2896> with good וַעֲצַ֥ת <WH6098> [things] but the counsel רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> of the wicked רָ֣חֲקָה <WH7368> is far מֶֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> at
יִרְא֣וּ <WH7200> see צַדִּיקִ֣ים <WH6662> The righteous וְיִשְׂמָ֑חוּ <WH8055> [it] and are glad וְ֝נָקִ֗י <WH5355> and the innocent יִלְעַג־ <WH3932> laugh them to scorn לָֽמוֹ׃

אִם־ <WH518> Whereas לֹ֣א <WH3808> not נִכְחַ֣ד <WH3582> is not cut down קִימָ֑נוּ <WH7009> our substance וְ֝יִתְרָ֗ם <WH3499> but the remnant אָ֣כְלָה <WH398> consumeth אֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> of them the fire

הַסְכֶּן־ <WH5532> Acquaint נָ֣א <WH4994> now עִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> and be at וּשְׁלם <WH7999> now thyself with him and be at peace בָּ֝הֶ֗ם תְּֽבוֹאַתְךָ֥ <WH935> shall come טוֹבָֽה׃ <WH2896> thereby good

קַח־ <WH3947> Receive נָ֣א <WH4994> Please מִפִּ֣יו <WH6310> from his mouth תּוֹרָ֑ה <WH8451> I pray thee the law וְשִׂ֥ים <WH7760> and lay up אֲ֝מָרָ֗יו <WH561> his words בִּלְבָבֶֽךָ׃ <WH3824> in thine heart

אִם־ <WH518> If תָּשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> If thou return עַד־ <WH5704> against שַׁ֭דַּי <WH7706> to the Almighty תִּבָּנֶ֑ה <WH1129> thou shalt be built up תַּרְחִ֥יק <WH7368> far עַ֝וְלָ֗ה <WH5766> iniquity מֵאָהֳלֶֽךָ׃ <WH168> from thy tabernacles וְשִׁית־ <WH7896> apply עַל־ <WH5921> in
עָפָ֥ר <WH6083> dust בָּ֑צֶר <WH1220> gold וּבְצ֖וּר <WH6697> as the stones נְחָלִ֣ים <WH5158> of the brooks אוֹפִֽיר׃ <WH211> and the [gold] of Ophir
וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> Then שַׁדַּ֣י <WH7706> Yea the Almighty בְּצָרֶ֑יךָ <WH1220> shall be thy defence וְכֶ֖סֶף <WH3701> of silver תּוֹעָפ֣וֹת <WH8443> and thou shalt have plenty לָֽךְ׃

כִּי־ <WH3588> For אָ֭ז <WH227> then עַל־ <WH5921> in שַׁדַּ֣י <WH7706> in the Almighty תִּתְעַנָּ֑ג <WH6026> For then shalt thou have thy delight וְתִשָּׂ֖א <WH5375> and shalt lift up אֶל־ <WH413> to אֱל֣וֹהַּ <WH433> unto God פָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> thy face
תַּעְתִּ֣יר <WH6279> Thou shalt make thy prayer אֵ֭לָיו <WH413> to him וְיִשְׁמָעֶ֑ךָּ <WH8085> unto him and he shall hear וּנְדָרֶ֥יךָ <WH5088> thy vows תְשַׁלֵּֽם׃ <WH7999> thee and thou shalt pay

וְֽתִגְזַר־ <WH1504> Thou shalt also decree א֭וֹמֶר <WH562> a thing וְיָ֣קָם <WH6965> and it shall be established לָ֑ךְ וְעַל־ <WH5921> on דְּ֝רָכֶ֗יךָ <WH1870> upon thy ways נָ֣גַֽהּ <WH5050> shall shine אֽוֹר׃ <WH216> unto thee and the light

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When הִ֭שְׁפִּילוּ <WH8213> When [men] are cast down וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> then thou shalt say גֵּוָ֑ה <WH1466> [There is] lifting up וְשַׁ֖ח <WH7807> the humble עֵינַ֣יִם <WH5869> person יוֹשִֽׁעַ׃ <WH3467> and he shall save

יְֽמַלֵּ֥ט <WH4422> He shall deliver אִֽי־ <WH336> the island נָקִ֑י <WH5355> of the innocent וְ֝נִמְלַ֗ט <WH4422> and it is delivered בְּבֹ֣ר <WH1252> by the pureness כַּפֶּֽיךָ׃ <WH3709> of thine hands פ
